summary: Retrieve RSS pickup jobs based on time range and status filter
description: Retrieve RSS pickup jobs based on time range and status filter.

query.name: from
query.description: Epoch millis of job date from

query.name: till
query.description: Epoch millis of job date till

query.name: statuses
query.description: Job statuses filter. Possible job statuses are "pending", "arrived", "pickedup", "cancelled" and "failed". Concatenate statuses of interest with "," to make queries with multiple job status filter. Leave this field blank or null to query without filtering.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/rss/pickup-jobs/get')
request.add_api_parameter("storeId", "414")
request.add_api_parameter("from", "1709266007000")
request.add_api_parameter("till", "1710216407000")
request.add_api_parameter("statuses", "\"pickedup, pending\"")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/rss/pickup-jobs/get')
request.add_api_param('storeId', '414')
request.add_api_param('from', '1709266007000')
request.add_api_param('till', '1710216407000')
request.add_api_param('statuses', '\"pickedup, pending\"')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
